I copied the files to content -> 0000000000000000. the game appeared in my "Xbox 360 games" but when I try to launch it, it freezes and doesn't work.. any suggestions?

@mohammadjl ...i believe u shuld burn it into a dvd(4.7) using ImageBurn with some special instruction to make a xbox dvd game...ur console shuld be flashed (LT.03) ..when u use the dvd dont play it from the dvd itself...u ll find an icon (PES2013)in quick play partation...it will work fine then
